website_summaries.verdict: An affordable, kid-friendly water trampoline ideal for younger children.
pros: Removable boarding platform makes getting back on easy
cons: Difficult to determine how much to inflate it
Doesn't have a lot of bounce

customer_reviews.title: there is actually a good bounce on it compared to ours
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had spent the extra money for a rave or other brand. This takes too much effort to get inflated to a firmness to actually bounce on. I tried everything. High pressure inflators, leaf blowers etc. I finally got the airvalve adapter and hook up my compressor to it to get it firm. My neighbor has the rave and although he has to inflate his every couple of days as well, there is actually a good bounce on it compared to ours.
customer_reviews.author: boatguy

customer_reviews.title: Needs more bounce
customer_reviews.text: Just does not bounce well, we are going to try again and use zip ties to really get the top super tight, pump up tighter as well and hopefully it works better; will return to review if it works
customer_reviews.author: Sparta Fan

customer_reviews.title: Good island, not an awesome trampoline.
customer_reviews.text: Good island but not bouncy, regardless of how filled up it is. Wishing I had read the reviews prior to purchase (I know, I'm a newb) but it was the only one I could have delivered by the date I needed it. Ok price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t bounce
customer_reviews.text: Is supposed to be a trampoline but doesn’t bounce trampoline part it’s just tied on with rope instead of springs or bungee so it doesn’t bounce at all. Is pretty much just floating lounge but definitely not a trampoline.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: An air mattress has more bounce!
customer_reviews.text: This thing was awful. No bounce, and made awful. Save your money, it's almost impossible to get back in box to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It a great product, shipping ok
customer_reviews.text: It a great product, shipping ok. The only thing that they should mention is how many air need " CBF " And what kind of air copressor need to use. The manufacture does not mention that at all, I have to look for some thing that can pump from car power.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lim

customer_reviews.title: Sent back to manufacturer. No spring in the jump ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent back to manufacturer. No spring in the jump bc there are no springs. Item deflated after finally getting inflated and on water. Very heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Gondi

customer_reviews.title: Fun once you can get on
customer_reviews.text: You need a high powered air pump for this. It's difficult to get on especially for small kids.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous fun.  Great Quaility
customer_reviews.text: We have used this for a few weeks at the end of the summer in the bay, which is not easy on flotation devices. So far it has held up nicely, hasn't lost air and the kids ranging in age from 13 to 19 have all had a great time either flipping off of it or lounging on it. Great purchase. P.s. the ladder is useless but no one seemed to mind
customer_reviews.author: N L.

customer_reviews.title: Got a hole on the first use.
customer_reviews.text: First time we used this bouncer, it got a hole in it and deflated. There is a patch kit and we are going to try that but it is frustrating to spend this much money on something and have it be broken after the first use.
customer_reviews.author: KellyB

customer_reviews.title: So fun
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to take down to Lake Powell for a week long houseboat trip with the family. Kids loved it. We blew it up and had it moored to the back of the houseboat. It sat out there all week. My kids were jumping from the top of the houseboat and landing on this. Initially was worried that it would tear, but it stood up to some serious abuse without any issues. Was able to deflate and put back in the box for storage fairly easily. Definitely a 2 person job though. Have it stored for the winter and will take it out again next year and update with how it weathered storage.
customer_reviews.author: chedder123

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kids had a great time on it. Sturdy, strong. Just what we needed for our week on the lake.
customer_reviews.author: John Foley

customer_reviews.title: Hated It
customer_reviews.text: Item was shipped, It took 2 days to blow up, Did not come with an air compressor, and after a week developed a leak. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lillie Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Not  a good product
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use the bouncer. There was a hole in it. I would not order it. Thank you kindly
customer_reviews.author: leslie gray

customer_reviews.title: Great trampoline
customer_reviews.text: Right size Right price A little difficult to inflate The kids (and mom) love it and it looks safe enough
customer_reviews.author: Tomer Nofech Mozes

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to determine how much to inflate.does not provide much resistance.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but the box looks really cool.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth m savelli

customer_reviews.title: Does not bounce
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for lake use. Inflated it pretty easy and anchored it securely. Stayed inflated on the water for a week. Kids were excited to use it. Doesn't bounce, kids ranged from 9 to 17. They tried their best, the most bounce they got was 12". Not worth the money if you are looking for a bouncer. Kids stopped using it after 1 hour. The island float we also bought got all the use for half the money. I will be returning this bouncer. Looks fun, but a no go.
customer_reviews.author: Roseville CA

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one summer
customer_reviews.text: We got a summer's worth out of it in 2017. When I blew it up in 2018, the seams did not hold and it quickly deflated.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieCarlson

customer_reviews.title: Absolute blast!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Funstation years ago. We inflate and deflate each weekend - probably about 6-8 weekends a year. We had it for at least 6 years with hundreds of kids jumping on it over the years. By year 5 we started needing a few patches (I bought PVC from the local boating store and cut the patches myself. It was such an awesome toy that was loved by so many kids. We finally threw it away last year - but now I am buying another one!!! Such a blast!
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Worst investment ever made
customer_reviews.text: Worst investment ever made. The vulcanization let loose, which is definitely a manufacturer defect. When that happened it ripped a hole that cannot be fixed. When we contacted them they told us there was no way to fix it and they would not cover it. Don't buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Bird

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand new last year. It was only in the water 2 months at most. I deflated it and stored it. This year I inflated it (not nearly to the pressure that it is supposed to be, and it split at the seam. I've tried twice to fix it, but it won't hold. I would not buy anything from Sportstuff that is this expensive again
customer_reviews.author: Valerie L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not so good...
customer_reviews.text: Too heavy to be practical. To inflate you must pull it out of the water and it weighs a ton The first one had a defect (the 10ft;) and they sent a new one (12 ft). The bigger one was just too heavy. And it did get leaks and needed a larger anchor or at least a chain on the anchor..
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn  from Dunedin Fl

product_meta.title: SportsStuff PVC Funstation Bouncer
feature_bullets: Get some air on the giant FUNSTATIONs, available in two sizes, 10 ft and 12 ft. Inflation is easy with their single chamber design

The removable boarding platform with molded handles makes it a cinch to climb onboard. The anchor system (included) keeps the bouncer stable as you jump. Heavy-duty molded handles allow a friend to hold on from the platform
Heavy-duty K80 PVC with a large bouncing surface and padded nylon collar. Reach for the stars while jumping on these mammoth bouncers
Heavy-Duty K80 PVC Construction.Anchor System Included
Removable Platform With Molded PVC Handles.Single Chamber Design

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
